name: AIming Practice
description:
The AI is your Weapon!

Jump around in a classic platformer, but there's a twist:

There are enemies constantly spawning, and you need to influence a flying arrow to kill the enemies!

How to Play:

A/D/Left Gamepad Joystick - Move

W/Space/A on Gamepad - Jump

The white arrow follows you. Get close to enemies (but not too close!) so the arrow can slice them through

Avoid the warning signs. When they fill up, another enemy will spawn!

Every time you kill an enemy there's a chance it drops a power-up!

CONTROLLER HIGHLY RECOMMENDED
